title: 140: Episode #140: You Just Got MuggleCast'd
itunes:title: Episode #140: You Just Got MuggleCast'd
description:
• APRIL FOOLS.
  • Andrew questions the motives for mocking him when he’s away.
  • We discuss JK Rowling’s answers at the James Joyce Awards.
  • Could Intercollegiate Quidditch be the next big thing in the fandom?
  • It’s a new month (mApril), so vote for us on Podcast Alley!
  • Create Your Own MuggleCast Segment Contest returns!
  • Micah updates you on the transcript situation and asks for new transcribers.
  • We experiment with Amazon’s unSpun to get visitors involved with discussions.
  • Andrew talks about his visit to the Twilight set.
  • Chapter by Chapter covers Chapters 24 and 25 of Deathly Hallows.
  • Dobby is dead, and we mourn.
  • We discuss Griphook’s very intriguing view of Harry.
  • Remus asks Harry to be Ted’s godfather. We talk about the change of heart since their last meeting.
  • John Hurt MUST come back for Deathly Hallows reprise his role as Ollivander, we decide.
  • We call an audible with Make the Music Connection.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
